about_the_game:
Once sworn enemies, Slavs and Lizards made peace for the glory of the Holy Stand! Two species coexist in harmony, enjoying life of passion and lust with each other. Exactly as father Perun willed it... Although it is only true for a single village. For now.



Ratibor, the champion of Slavs, and the warrior lizard Viente travel to the Lizardwomen capital, Atlantis, to seal an official friendship agreement between the peoples and spread peace and love into every corner of both Hyperborea and Atlantis.

But can the century-long grudge between lizards and Slavs truly be cast aside? Or is it just a calm before the storm? Might Mathematics, the goddess of lizards, be planning something? Or maybe there is some third party seeking to shatter the fragile peace?

PREPARE FOR:
  • Historically accurate depiction of the events leading up to the formation of the Atlantic Treaty
  • Dearly beloved match-3 challenges, rewarded with EVEN SPICIER animated and voiced sex-scenes
  • Branching story
  • Even more naked maidens and lizard-women, longing for passion!

content_descriptors.notes: The game features nude human and furry (anthropomorphic) characters, explicit graphic sex scenes between them, strong language.

name: Humans are not that against Lizardwomen 2
